reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft, comfortable, and like its nice color. The fit and sizing receive mixed feedback - while some say it fits amazing and is very long, others find it too short. The quality and material thickness also get mixed reviews, with some praising it while others describe it as cheap and thinner than expected.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size and quality
items.body: It’s really soft and the quality is very good. It looks perfect, just like the picture. Money well spent. Also I’m not a small gal and it still fit perfectly! Read more
items.author: These are so beautiful

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOOKS GREAT <3
items.body: It looks just like the photo feels really soft it's not super thick so if you think you're going to wear it over certain clothes at certain temperatures be cautious but the fabric is really nice really soft then and if you pull out the strings in more than likely will unravel or get caught on something so just be aware of that Read more
items.author: Angle star

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Very light and comfy. The only downside is it's quite fragile. Color is just like the picture. Stretchy and a little warm when I start moving in it. Read more
items.author: Annette L. Richards

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely sweater!
items.body: I got this for a concert and had such a blast! I got so many compliments for my outfit <33 The material is very nice and comfortable. It is quite long but that is something I like about it. I suggest wearing a tank top or something underneath because it is very see-through! <3 Read more
items.author: Buggy

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately not what I expected
items.body: Just a run-down: I got this sweater for my Halloween costume (Marceline the Vampire Queen). I am roughly 4’10" and 145lbs, and this sweater was super long on me (which is a plus!). Additionally, I appreciated how lightweight it was to wear, yet it was relatively warm considering its see-through nature. However, the material is not great. It’s clearly not made well. The distressed holes are in bizarre places, and just within a day of its arrival, it already looks to be unraveling. Yes, the sweater is “stretchy” because the holes get bigger and bigger within 30 minutes of wearing it. Lastly, I noticed that the bottom of the sweater flares out in a really unusual way. I don’t know if it’s my body type or the material, but it was really unflattering and hard to style in a way that looked good (via jeans, shorts, etc.). Unfortunately, I will be returning and hopefully will find a better black and red sweater :( Read more
items.author: ReanieBean

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adaptable size! Bigger girls, it works!
items.body: I was really worried that this was going to be way too small for me. I’m 5’2” and 220lbs, but this fits! Does it fit the way it does on the model? Nope, but it runs long enough to hit me on my upper/mid thigh and is stretchy enough and wide enough to look a little slouchy cute and fit my 40G chest. I just got it to match a pair of Hot Chocolate’s purple Nightmare mary jane’s and it’s a perfect color match! I’m thrilled. 2005 here I come! Read more
items.author: RM

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shape was Off
items.body: Purchased for a Cheshire Cat Halloween costume and the colors were rich but the fit was bazaar. Odd shaping and more holes than expected. Was also much longer than expected. Didn’t work for what we needed. Read more
items.author: Nicole M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & Comfy
items.body: Was perfect for the concert I went to. It’s still very long even on a tall girl like me. Just make sure to wear an undershirt! Read more
items.author: Inara J

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black&gold, Black& Light Purple, Black&grey, Black&purple, Black&rose Red, Black&fluorescent Green, Black&yellow, Black&white, Gradient-black Blue, Gradient-black Green, Black&red, Black&orange, Gradient-black Pink, Black&pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
